function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate health policymaking in China and elsewhere","Impact":"Increased risk of epidemic trajectory","Mitigation":"Implementing one health approaches and endorsing climate change mitigation","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, environmental sensors","People":"Public health authorities, policymakers, general public","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of emphasis on curbing climate change","Impact":"Increased risk of future epidemics","Mitigation":"Taking serious action to curb climate change","Technologies":"Renewable energy, sustainable infrastructure","People":"Global population, future generations","Owner":"Governments, environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of concern for the health of the environment","Impact":"Increased risk of epidemic outbreaks","Mitigation":"Raising awareness and implementing environmental conservation measures","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring devices, pollution control technologies","People":"General public, environmentalists","Owner":"Environmental organizations"}]}
